para.text: The web site below has graphs illustrating how the various subroutines and functions in the MODFLOW-2005 source code are related. For each subroutine or function, the graphs show what calls them and what they call. The graphs are generated from the MODFLOW FORTRAN source code. The C source code in MODFLOW is not included. These graphs apply only to MODFLOW-2005 and not other versions of MODFLOW.
